## Cheese scones `r freezes`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

225g SR flour \
1tsp mustard powder \
1/4tsp salt \
pinch cayenne \
1tsp BP \
55g butter \
100g grated cheese \
1 egg \
120ml milk

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

190째 \
10mins \
10 x 7.5cm

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Mix dry, then rub in butter to breadcrumbs.
1. Stir in cheese.
1. Beat egg in jug and add milk.
1. Add most wet to dry, but keep a little for glazing.
1. Roll to 1.5cm thick.

## Classic scones `r freezes` `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

350g SR flour \
1tsp BP \
85g butter \
3tbsp (45g) caster sugar \
optional 85g fruit \
175ml milk \
1tsp vanilla \
squeeze lemon juice

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

200째 \
10mins \
6 x 7.8cm or 14 x 5.8cm

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Mix dry.
1. Rub in butter to breadcrumbs.
1. Stir in sugar (and fruit).
1. Warm milk about 30seconds then add vanilla and lemon and set aside for a moment.
1. Heat baking tray.
1. Add wet to dry well and combine quickly with knife.
1. Tip onto floured surface, dredge with flour and fold over 2-3 times.
1. Pat into about 4cm high, cut, glaze, bake.

*Notes*

- To avoid dried out outside fruit: try soaking first so have liquid to lose? Or keep some spare dough to cover them up?

## Tattie scones `r freezes` `r vegan` {#sec-tattie-scone}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

250g potato \
1/2tsp salt \
25g butter \
75g P flour

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

12

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Mash potato and butter.
1. Add flour to form a dough.
1. Roll to 3mm thick and cut.
1. Bake on heavy based flat pan until golden brown on both sides.
